sources.title: One Way Out
sources.description: Title: One Way Out Summary: As he is about to retire, a police officer discovers that his daughter is mixed up with a criminal gang and is about to go to prison for a crime she didn't commit. Against his better ... Directed by: Francis Searle Actors: Jill Adams, Eddie Byrne, Lyndon Brook Production Company: Major Pictures Release Date: September 1955 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 As he is about to retire, a police officer discovers that his daughter is mixed up with a criminal gang and is about to go to prison for a crime she didn't commit. Against his better judgment, he comes up with a plan to keep her from going to prison.

metadata.Plot: As he is about to retire, a police officer discovers that his daughter is mixed up with a criminal gang and is about to go to prison for a crime she didn't commit. Against his better judgment, he comes up with a plan to keep her from going to prison.
metadata.Writer: Jonathan Roche, Jean Scott Rogers, John Temple-Smith
metadata.Actors: Jill Adams, Eddie Byrne, Lyndon Brook
